text: Karen Berg (born Karen Mulnick; October 12, 1942 - July 30, 2020) was an American author. She was born in New York City. Berg was the founder of the Kabbalah Centre International. She wrote four books; God Wears Lipstick: Kabbalah for Women; Simple Light, Wisdom from a Woman's Heart; To Be Continued, Reincarnation and the Purpose of our Lives; and Finding the Light through the Darkness, Inspirational lessons rooted in the Bible and the Zohar. Berg died on July 30, 2020 at the age of 77.Dear Friends and Colleagues ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from New York City
